name: Aether
tagline: Aether is a typing game built on top of the Phaser game framework.
body:
### Aether
Aether is a reimagining of what I created in 2015 with [Zodiac](http://rcjsuen.github.io/zodiac/index.html). With that in mind, Aether is at its core something that is meant to help people learn languages. At the same time, it is also a typing game.

### Play
Click [here](game.html) to play Aether!

### Credits
Aether is written by @rcjsuen.

The game assets were downloaded from [Kenney.nl](http://www.kenney.nl/). Thank you so much!

### Support or Contact
If you have any feedback, suggestions, or bugs to report about Aether, please contact @rcjsuen or visit [Aether's GitHub page](https://github.com/rcjsuen/aether).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
